abstract: Federal Reserve's policy-making committee is divided on direction of monetary policy; three conservative members say Fed has already done too much, and two liberals say it needs to do much more; chairman Ben S Bernanke is focused on communicating benefits of existing policies in order to increase their impact.
snippet: Three conservative members say the Fed has already done too much; two liberals say the Fed needs to do much more.
lead_paragraph: Three conservative members say the Fed has already done too much; two liberals say the Fed needs to do much more.

headline.main: As Meeting Approaches, Fed Panel Is Divided on Direction
headline.print_headline: Fed Panel Is Divided On Direction
headline.seo: Fed Panel Is Divided on Direction
